description.en: A generic clustering of meronomy (parthood) relations, allowing for the traversal of the parthood taxonomy of a real estate. Note that this is a transitive property. Inverse of: hasPart
Inverse properties of the isPartOf property tree, used for top-down traversal of the parthood hierarchy. Inverse of: isPartOf
Indicates which Building a certain Building Component is part of. Inverse of: hasBuildingComponent
A part that constitutes a piece of a building's structural makeup. E.g., Facade, Wall, Slab, RoofInner, etc.
